solution.text:
No. of cards marked with a number less than \(_{{j-3}}_=_{{j-4}}_\)
Total number of cards \(=_{{(2*j)+1}}_\)
Probability that the number on the card is less than \(_{{j-3}}_=\frac{_{{j-4}}_}{_{{(2*j)+1}}_}=_{{Fraction(j-4,((2*j)+1))}}_\)

content.text: Cards marked with numbers \(1\) to \(_{{(2*j)+1}}_\) are placed in a box and mixed thoroughly. One card is drawn at random, what is the probability that the number on the card is less than \(_{{j-3}}_\)?
